main event: A U.S. soldier observed a disc-shaped object while photographing in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba on April 21, 1960.
interesting points: The observation involved air-radar detection of a single object., The photograph was initially believed to show a UFO but was later determined to be a reflection from a light inside the building., Analysis indicated that the object was likely a reflection on the window rather than an actual unidentified flying object., The photograph was taken with a Zeiss Ikoflex camera at a speed of 1/500th of a second., No recognized human faces were present in the photographs or documents related to the incident.
witness description: U.S. soldier who took the photograph
